channel.title: Sysex mapping capabilities
channel.description:
Might there be future capabilities to take a midi in and be able to remap it to sysex/NRPN etc midi out?
I was thinking of axoloti as a sort of bome midi translator to input a regular midi hardware controller translator for output to older synth sysex etc. Or add knobs of my own to a little box.
thanks

item.title: Sysex mapping capabilities
item.dc:creator: @blaerg
item.description:
@blaerg wrote:

Good to know. Maybe something for the future. I was able to accomplish what I was looking for with the CTRLR plugin anyhow in the meantime. The Tx81z has a weak MIDI buffer and locks up easily so heavy modulation would probably be somewhat pointless anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Sysex mapping capabilities
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

theoretically yes... though I donâ€™t know size and frequency of messages involved

Read full topic

item.title: Sysex mapping capabilities
item.dc:creator: @blaerg
item.description:
@blaerg wrote:

@thetechnobear
Pardon my lack of understanding/ignorance on this, but could the functionality of this be approximated with the Axoloti?
https://www.stereoping.com/synth-controller/?lang=en

I would like to send sysex output data in real time to control a Tx81z. Could be CV from the Axoloti itself or via knobs from a USB controller. Just wondering how feasible this is...

Read full topic

item.title: Sysex mapping capabilities
item.dc:creator: @mokomo
item.description:
@mokomo wrote:

sounds very promising so.

have to say I'm bowled over by this great project and the swiss army knife that is the axoloti!

Read full topic

item.title: Sysex mapping capabilities
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

I added sysex output to usb hosting firmware recently (its how I drive the ableton push LCD) ,
I guess I could add it to midi din/usb device.
(adding sysex input would need more work, and poses some questions)

NRPN/RPN are just CC messages so these can already be sent.

yes can easily be used as a sort of midi translator/router... I use it as such for my virus, as well as a sequencer

Read full topic
